name: Wurds Hurt
description:
Game developed for ISEP's GameJam 2022

Theme: "An Unconventional Weapon"

Sometimes, the heaviest words hurt more than the mightiest weapon...

Two distinguished  gentlemen present themselves in a fisticuffs but- no fists are thrown! Only two foul mouths, insulting each other... TO DEATH! 

No stickmen were hurt in the making of this game.

During the gamejam, we were fed: Cafeteria food (dinner), Pizza (lunch), Pizza (dinner), McDonalds (lunch)

Instructions:

The game has 3 rounds + the OVERLOAD round. During a round, each player will attack once. 

Type words to defeat your opponent. The longer the word, the more damage you will deal. Words in bold are RICH WORDS (words we thought were funny and uncommon) and will deal more damage than the other words.

The OVERLOAD turn is the last turn. It will only finish when one of the players is defeated.
